titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Gynecologic Cancer Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/27/2005--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Gynecologic Cancer Awareness Month (September). Expresses the sense of Congress that the National Institutes of Health (NIH), the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), and the Food and Drug Administration's (FDA) Office of Women's Health should coordinate efforts to establish a National Gynecologic Cancer Awareness and Education Campaign targeting the medical community and all women regardless of ethnic or socioeconomic background.
